div.p: In ActiveMQ 4, we are using a new xml format to configure the broker.
The following xsd describes the syntax of the broker configuration file.
And here is the reference documentation for that xsd file.

structured-macro.plain-text-body:
<beans xmlns="http://activemq.org/config/1.0">
<broker useJmx="true">
<persistenceAdapter> <journaledJDBC journalLogFiles="5" dataDirectory="../data"/> </persistenceAdapter>
<transportConnectors> <transportConnector uri="discovery:tcp://localhost:61616"/> </transportConnectors>
<networkConnectors> <networkConnector uri="multicast"/> </networkConnectors>
</broker>
</beans>
